newsitem.title: CANADA: Bank of Canada says easing now "substantial".
newsitem.headline: Bank of Canada says easing now "substantial".

text.p: The Bank of Canada said the timing of its rate cut on Thursday was influenced by the recent favorable tone in financial markets, including the narrowing of Canada-U.S. spreads between medium- and long-term bond yields.
The Bank also said the cumulative monetary easing now in place is "substantial" and can be expected to have a positive impact on the economy over the next year or so.
